metadata.title: CVE-2024-21803 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Linux Linux kernel kernel on Linux, x86,ARM (bluetooth modules) allows Local Execution of Code. This vulnerabilityis associated with program fileshttps://gitee.Com/anolis/cloud-kernel/blob/devel-5.10/net/bluetooth/af_bluetooth.C.This issue affects Linux kernel: from v2.6.12-rc2 before v6.8-rc1.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
